text: Friday were days one to five of the timetable, the following Monday was day six and Tuesday started day one again and so on. By this means they avoided each week being the same with a pupil knowing exactly what the subject would be on Friday afternoon at 3 p.m.
handwritten_text: Friday were days one to five of the timetable, the following Monday was day six and Tuesday started day one again and so on. By this means they avoided each week being the same with a pupil knowing exactly what the subject would be on Friday afternoon at 3 p.m.
